CustomField.formula: IF( AnnualRevenue <= 50000000, 50, IF( AnnualRevenue <= 500000000, MCEILING(AnnualRevenue/(25*1000000))*25, MCEILING(AnnualRevenue/(100*1000000))*100 ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Based on the converted annual revenue, what is the license band for this account?
CustomField.label: License Band (Revenue)
